entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Richmond Hill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Buttonville Municipal Airport 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

Pressure: 102.1 kPa

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 late in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
